use_cases_desc: Voting system, e.g., for rating designs during creative processes such as brainstorming.
contribution_desc: Interaction techniques for voting on collaboratively created artifacts. For example, rating designs created during creative work. The three interaction techniques are order to vote, shift to vote, and turn to drop.
interaction_techniques: Voting techniques; order to vote; shift to vote; turn to drop
tracking_tech: Radio; Bluetooth; IMU; Initialize relative device positions through swipe gestures or hovering
contribution: Interaction techniques; Voting design solutinos during creative design
